job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Responsible for Develop ML based solutions that aid in the curation and augmentation of one of the largest international entertainment data sets in the world.

job_details.full_text:
Lead Machine Learning Engineer

Responsible for Develop ML based solutions that aid in the curation and augmentation of one of the largest international entertainment data sets in the world.
   \nRequired

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing ML-based solutions for data curation and augmentation, which aligns with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer focused on predictive modeling and data-driven algorithms. While Generative AI is not explicitly mentioned, the focus on building ML solutions for data processing and enhancement points towards a traditional ML Engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop ML based solutions' directly relates to the creation and implementation of machine learning models.

The phrase 'curation and augmentation of one of the largest international entertainment data sets in the world' implies significant work with data, including cleaning, organizing, and enhancing it, which falls under data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: curation and augmentation of one of the largest international entertainment data sets in the world
